title: The Occasional Swearing Of Hitched Perrin
description: In this series of books titled “The Occasional Swearing” comedy writer Jimmy Perrin takes a look at different topics, then tries to figure them out Some readers call it clever wit, some readers call it rambling sh^t, but one thing is for certain... You will be able to relate to some of the things he writes about and will have a laugh.  The former best selling novelist, has turned into a factual writer. Where he tangles with myth and reality, then bravely takes on whatever subject is thrown his way.  INSIDE THIS BOOK... Jimmy tackles the subject of marriage, tries to stay hitched whilst writing the book, then more importantly, tries to keep his own tackle attached to his body, sitting cowardly on the fence with many sensitive matrimonial topics. He takes you on a journey from dating to the wedding day, then manages to avoid all household chores, claiming he's busy writing this book. Jimmy wants to show you the true meaning of a partnership, and passionately tell you how not to become another boring, prudish, argumentative couple.
author: James Perrin
